title: Mystery Skin Help
body:
I got a mystery skin from the rune mission, but I never got to see what it was. Could a Rioter tell me. I have this issue with mystery skins all the time. I open the box, and I do not know what I got.

EDIT: I checked in my shop history and it is not listed. I got my epic skin from purchasing rune pages (Dark Star Orianna), but nothing is listed after that.

replies.body: Check out your recent purchases tab! The skin you got given based on your rune pages should show up in there at the top of the list if it's the most recent skin.
I just looked over the mission. It is a mystery epic skin. My bad. It showed the skin then the box, so I thought there were two.
